name: popover
docstring: Floating element for displaying rich content, triggered by a button.

properties.name: PopoverRoot.open
properties.docstring: The controlled open state of the popover.

properties.name: PopoverRoot.modal
properties.docstring: The modality of the popover. When set to true, interaction with outside elements will be disabled and only popover content will be visible to screen readers.

properties.name: PopoverRoot.default_open
properties.docstring: The open state of the popover when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.

properties.name: PopoverContent.side
properties.docstring: The preferred side of the anchor to render against when open. Will be reversed when collisions occur and avoidCollisions is enabled.

properties.name: PopoverContent.side_offset
properties.docstring: The distance in pixels from the anchor.

properties.name: PopoverContent.align
properties.docstring: The preferred alignment against the anchor. May change when collisions occur.

properties.name: PopoverContent.align_offset
properties.docstring: The vertical distance in pixels from the anchor.

properties.name: PopoverContent.avoid_collisions
properties.docstring: When true, overrides the side andalign preferences to prevent collisions with boundary edges.

properties.name: PopoverContent.collision_padding
properties.docstring: The distance in pixels from the boundary edges where collision detection should occur. Accepts a number (same for all sides), or a partial padding object, for example: { "top": 20, "left": 20 }. Defaults to 0.

properties.name: PopoverContent.sticky
properties.docstring: The sticky behavior on the align axis. "partial" will keep the content in the boundary as long as the trigger is at least partially in the boundary whilst "always" will keep the content in the boundary regardless. Defaults to "partial".

properties.name: PopoverContent.hide_when_detached
properties.docstring: Whether to hide the content when the trigger becomes fully occluded. Defaults to False.

events.name: PopoverRoot.on_open_change
events.docstring: Fired when the open state changes.

events.name: PopoverContent.on_open_auto_focus
events.docstring: Fired when the dialog is opened.

events.name: PopoverContent.on_close_auto_focus
events.docstring: Fired when the dialog is closed.

events.name: PopoverContent.on_escape_key_down
events.docstring: Fired when the escape key is pressed.

events.name: PopoverContent.on_pointer_down_outside
events.docstring: Fired when the pointer is down outside the dialog.

events.name: PopoverContent.on_focus_outside
events.docstring: Fired when focus moves outside the dialog.

events.name: PopoverContent.on_interact_outside
events.docstring: Fired when the pointer interacts outside the dialog.
